case_title: USA, et al v. Favela-Campoa, et al
case_info_full_case_name: USA, et al v. Favela-Campoa, et al

charges.charge_disposition: dft is committed to BOP for 18 months unsupervised probation with the condition that the dft not re-enter the United States of America without permission from the Attorney General of the United States. s/a remitted (2)

charges.charge_description: CT 1 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(vii) Possess with Intent to Distribute 100 kilograms or more, but less than 1,000 Kilograms of Marijuana CT 2 21:844(a) Possesion of Marijuana
